name: ameliorate-e2e
description: This is a separate package specifically for the e2e tests dependencies, since they don't require the large majority of package setup as the root project

engines.//: run `nvm install` to use the right versions; these are enforced via .npmrc's engine-strict when npm is used
engines.//2: different from root package.json because these are the versions that come with the playwright container
engines.//3: without these, CI would use a different version than local, since it pulls the root repo's directory first, which has a different version of node

scripts.// container commands: these are for running locally, which is intended to be from outside of the container, for convenience
scripts.// non-container commands: these are for running via CI, which is entirely run within a container already
